name: sandalwood revolver
description: Made from blue-gray steel and comically large, this is the gun of a true gunslinger, passed down through the ages.  A rose, the sign of the Eld, is engaved in the side and the muzzle is covered in delicate scrollwork.

name: clockwork sandalwood revolver
description: Made from blue-gray steel and comically large, this is the gun of a true gunslinger.  Your upgrades have made it more accurate, more easily modifiable and, most importantly, more deadly.

name: masterwork sandalwood revolver
description: Made from blue-gray steel and comically large, this is the gun of a master gunslinger.  The mechanisms have been set perfectly, the balance ideal, the grip smooth and warm, almost alive in your palm.

name: clockwork slingshot
description: Charges a steel ball with static to release a painful, though not very damaging, silent attack.
